ygData.messageBody:
at 48 i have:
SS/rygorr arms
SS/rygorr gloves
SS/rygorr helm
Imbrued/SS boots
Rygorr legs (would of had imbrued if i would of not slept in this morning, 2
imbrued rotted)
guise of the deceiver
some 10 magic resist neck piece, i forgot the name
forest loop & magic resist earing
worn cloth mantle
kunzark cloak
sludged girdle
hero bracer/kylong wrist guard
plat diamond ring/stamina&agi
Imbrued BP (woot first raid to hate, 3rd day in *grin*) <-- guildmate was
not amused when he found out (he's 55 too)

weapons:
sionatchis partisan
stamina hogging ykesha
blackjack to raise 1hb

instruments:
kelins 7 string lute
nos tamborine
mino horn

Minkin
lev 48 bard
RIP
Ayeonae Ro
